articles.description: Are the 50MP camera and 'only' 67W charging reasonable compromises? The Redmi Note 12 series open the European chapter of their global journey today and we...
articles.content:
The Redmi Note 12 series open the European chapter of their global journey today and we have the Redmi Note 12 Pro in the office, so let's do an unboxing.
